# Automated Cyberbullying Detection
# ReadMe generated by Copilot

This repository contains a script for detecting cyberbullying using a neural network model. The dataset used for this project can be found at [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/datadrivenx/cyberbullying-detection-dataset-for-online-content/data).
=======
This repository contains a script for detecting cyberbullying using a neural network model. The dataset used for this project can be found at [Kaggle] (https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/datadrivenx/cyberbullying-detection-dataset-for-online-content/data).
>>>>>>> 22da3be71c739d121f210224787f8ea4eae196e6

## Files

- `Explore.py`: 
  1) This script loads the dataset, preprocesses the data,
  2) trains a neural network model,
  3) and evaluates its performance. 

  It also extracts feature importances using permutation importance and plots the loss curve.

<<<<<<< HEAD
## Description

This project aims to detect cyberbullying using a neural network model. The dataset used for this project can be found at [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/datadrivenx/cyberbullying-detection-dataset-for-online-content/data). The script preprocesses the data, trains a neural network model, evaluates its performance, and extracts feature importances.

## Installation

1. Clone the repository:
2. pip install numpy pandas scikit-learn matplotlib tensorflow

## Additional Information

### Tests and Results

We conducted several tests to evaluate the performance of our neural network model. Below are the configurations and results:

- **Configuration 1:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (16, 8), 'activation': 'relu', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9986

- **Configuration 2:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (32, 16), 'activation': 'relu', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9986

- **Configuration 3:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (64, 32), 'activation': 'relu', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9986

- **Configuration 4:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (16, 8), 'activation': 'tanh', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9981

- **Configuration 5:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (32, 16), 'activation': 'tanh', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9986

- **Configuration 6:**
  - Parameters: `{'hidden_layer_sizes': (64, 32), 'activation': 'tanh', 'solver': 'adam'}`
  - Accuracy: 0.9996

Extracting feature importances using permutation importance:
- Feature: Total_messages, Importance: 0.0534
- Feature: Aggressive_Count, Importance: 0.1629
- Feature: Intent_to_Harm, Importance: 0.0348
- Feature: Peerness, Importance: 0.0876

Generating the confusion matrix:
=======
# All Kaggle data found in the repo is from a public dataset. Only CB_Labels.csv is used
